body_html: Well it doesn't matter sometimes, which is when all of those slices get assigned the same value, but if you were to assign a tensor of size equal to that of the resulting slice, then you'd have few guarantees about the ordering of the resulting values.

body: Well it doesn't matter *sometimes*, which is when all of those slices get assigned the same value, but if you were to assign a tensor of size equal to that of the resulting slice, then you'd have few guarantees about the ordering of the resulting values.
